name: Unifynd
description: Unifynd helps Indian students find top international colleges with innovative tools and data. Discover college information, fee calculators, and more.

mainEntity.name: Home
mainEntity.description: The home page of Unifynd, offering resources and tools for international college admissions.

mainEntity.name: Blogs
mainEntity.description: Explore our latest blogs on international college admissions, tips, and advice.

mainEntity.name: College Info
mainEntity.description: Comprehensive information about various international colleges, including admission criteria and programs.

mainEntity.name: Fee Calculator
mainEntity.description: Use our fee calculator to estimate your college fees and plan your budget effectively.

mainEntity.name: Profile
mainEntity.description: Manage your profile and view your saved colleges and application details.

mainEntity.name: Authentication
mainEntity.description: Sign up, log in, and manage your account settings with Unifynd.

mainEntity.name: Explore
mainEntity.description: Explore different colleges and countries to find the best fit for your education.

mainEntity.name: US Colleges
mainEntity.description: Find detailed information about colleges in the United States, including admission requirements and programs.

mainEntity.name: UK Colleges
mainEntity.description: Discover colleges in the United Kingdom, including program details and application processes.

mainEntity.name: Canada Colleges
